byline.contributor: Lizette Alvarez reported from Miami, and Steve Eder from New York. Lea Iadarola contributed research.
byline.original: By LIZETTE ALVAREZ and STEVE EDER

abstract: Scandals surrounding former Rep David Rivera of Florida have become problematic for Sen Marco Rubio as questions arise about once-close relationship between pair; Rubio has sought to distance himself from Rivera, who for many years was his closest friend and staunchest political ally in Florida, but who has since fallen into political exile, subject of state and federal investigations.
lead_paragraph: David Rivera, once Mr. Rubio’s closest ally, is in political exile, trying to resuscitate a career tarnished by accusations of wrongdoing.

headline.main: Political Cloud Relegates Marco Rubio’s Onetime Insider to the Outside
headline.print_headline: Cloud Relegates Onetime Rubio Insider to the Outside

snippet: David Rivera, once Mr. Rubio’s closest ally, is in political exile, trying to resuscitate a career tarnished by accusations of wrongdoing.
